channel.title: Why is it taking forever for my ban appeal to go? its pending
channel.description:
i guess thats good that they didnt send me an automated response though...
why it take forever though?

item.title: Why is it taking forever for my ban appeal to go? its pending
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

[quote=“poopy4231, post:1, topic:21396”]i guess thats good that they didnt send me an automated response though…

why it take forever though?[/quote]
It took em to process a person reporting me and adding me an offence over 2 months…
Also it took 'em 3 to answer 1 o my complaints

94str
1def

i was gutted
